author: marcuss

comments.content: The latest re-design at [Reader's Digest](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018001940/http:/www.rd.com/) uses a customized version of Joshua Darden's [Freight Sans](http://web.archive.org/) for the logo. Makes sense that they would use other versions of Freight for the headlines.
Reader's Digest has been using Freight for, like, forever.
